channel.title: Fixing error "playername is already online!"
channel.description:
After about 20-30 minutes of my server being on it just kinda lags, and when people try to get back on it says they already on. I tried to make it so when that message comes up it kicks all the players, but it still says they are on. Sometimes it only happens to one person, sometimes everyone. I just would like a way to stop this.
Btw, it doesn't really happen like every 20-30 minutes, it's random, my server could be running fine for 2 hours, and sometimes after even 5 minutes it just does that. I never get nulls, and my server doesn't usually just crash, but this is the main error i get. If someone could plz help me fix this.

item.title: Fixing error "playername is already online!"
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Restarters always help

Wrong :)…

So yes, the problem is, you should set your Max Connections to like 100000

Or it could be something as simple, as clicking an item… Removing item from bank…

Well I hope you enjoyed my explanation and u read thoroughly with understanding. Post your specs.

Specs?..

Your problem could be ANYTHING at all, caused in player.java, server.java, npchandler.java, client.java… Before everyone disconnects, look in your runserver. And see the last thing that person(s) did.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing error "playername is already online!"
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Here is ur problem.

Normally this happens with Pimpscape. This problem hasn’t been figured out since the first ever Pimpscape has been released. You will be best off getting a new server.java that would work fine with your server. Restarters always help. Basically this happens because of yours computer’s capacity of how many players or characters can play at one time. For example I only have 1gb RAM but I tweeked my comp and without lag i can easily have 17 people on. Which that is a very fun amount to have, and everybody who is active an plays 1337scape (over 683 active) enjoy it so much. So yes, the problem is, you should set your Max Connections to like 100000, because it only gives you the error message you are getting when your server get’s overloaded, or because of massers, this tends to happen with 1337scape V1, because it was Pimpscape based, V2 won’t have this problem. So I guess last thing u can do is post ur system specs. Don’t lie and be honest. because if u lie, u will be called a noob, and if you are honest, atleast we will know what the problem is. Well I hope you enjoyed my explanation and u read thoroughly with understanding. Post your specs.

  • eclipse245

Read full topic
